newsitem.title: USA: New World Power closes sale of subsidiary.
newsitem.headline: New World Power closes sale of subsidiary.

text.p: New World Power Corp said on Tuesday it has closed the sale of its wholly owned subsidiary, New World do Brazil, and its 51 percent interest in Solartec S.A., to Golden Technologies Co Inc.
New World do Brazil is based in Sao Paulo and markets photovoltaic products, while Solartec is an Argentinian company that manufactures and distributes solar products.
Golden Technologies is a wholly owned subsidiary of ACX Corp of Golden, Colo.
Proceeds of the sale of the South American assets are to be used to retire a portion of the company's convertible subordinated notes and to pay off local liabilities in Brazil, the company said.
New World Power produces electricity generated from wind, solar and hydro energy.
